text: Inventory rose 5% this week. Sellers offering credits to close deals quickly.
Median price steady at $1.2M. Buyers gaining leverage with buydowns.
Fix & flip demand strong. Private money deals closing in 10 days.
Entry-level homes moving fast as affordability draws buyers inland.
Luxury market steady. Sellers holding firm on pricing near the coast.
New listings ticked up. Mid-range homes seeing multiple offers again.
